info.title: Cloudsmith API
info.description: The API to the Cloudsmith Service

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: A page number within the paginated result set.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: Number of results to return per page.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: A search string to limit results by name. Legal fields are: `name`. Boolean operators may be used to construct intricate queries. Omitting boolean operators is interpreted as an implicit `AND`.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: A comma-separated string of fields to sort by. Legal fields are: `created_at`, `name`, `version`, `updated_at`. Descending order can be expressed by prepending `-` to a field name.

get.description: List all actions for the policy.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: A page number within the paginated result set.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: Number of results to return per page.

post.description: Create an action for a policy.

get.description: Retrieve an action for a policy.

put.description: Update an action for a policy.

patch.description: Partially update an action for a policy.

delete.description: Delete an action for a policy.

get.description:
Simulates the execution of a Policy to verify its behavior without taking any actions.

This endpoint evaluates all packages in the organization, generating a "decision log" for each evaluation.
Each log contains:
- Package metadata provided to the policy engine at runtime.
- Output from the user-defined Rego policy.

No actions associated with the policy are executed. Instead, the endpoint reports what would happen to each package if the policy were active.

parameters.name: package_query_string
parameters.description: A [package search](https://help.cloudsmith.io/docs/search-packages) query by which to filter the packages being evaluated.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: A page number within the paginated result set.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: Number of results to return per page.

precedence.description: The order in which this action occurs relative to other actions for the same policy.

created_at.description: The date and time the policy was created.

updated_at.description: The date and time the policy was updated.

location.description: The city/town/area your organization is based in.

name.description: A descriptive name for your organization.

tagline.description: A short public descriptive for your organization.

PackageStateEnum.description:
* `AVAILABLE` - The package is available for download.
* `BLOCKED` - The package is not downloadable.
* `DELETED` - The package is deleted.
* `QUARANTINED` - The package is quarantined.

precedence.description: The order in which this action occurs relative to other actions for the same policy.

created_at.description: The date and time the policy was created.

updated_at.description: The date and time the policy was updated.

updated_at.description: The date and time the policy was updated.

target_repo.description: The slug_perm immutably identifies the repository. It will never change once a repository has been created.

created_at.description: The date and time the policy was created.

rego.description: The rego code which constitutes the Policy logic.

enabled.description: If true, the policy is enabled.

is_terminal.description: If true and the policy matches, no further policies are evaluated.

updated_at.description: The date and time the policy was updated.

version.description: The version of the rego code.

precedence.description: The order in which this policy is evaluated relative to other policies.

PolicyArchitecture.description: Serializer for a package architecture for policy purposes.

PolicyDistribution.description: Serializer for a distribution for policy purposes.

PolicyDistributionVersion.description: Serializer for a distribution version for policy purposes.

name.description: The textual name for this version.

PolicyPackage.description: Serializer for packages for policy purposes.

description.description: A textual description of this package.

epoch.description: The epoch of the package version (if any).

release.description: The release of the package version (if any).

security_scan_status_updated_at.description: The datetime the security scanning status was updated.

security_scan_started_at.description: The datetime the security scanning was started.

security_scan_completed_at.description: The datetime the security scanning was completed.

size.description: The calculated size of the package.

slug.description: The public unique identifier for the package.

summary.description: A one-liner synopsis of this package.

uploaded_at.description: The date this package was uploaded.

version.description: The raw version for this package.

PolicyPackageFile.description: Serializer for package files for policy purposes.

size.description: The calculated size of the file.

tag.description: Freeform descriptor that describes what the file is.

PolicyRepository.description: Serializer for the Repository model for policy purposes.

description.description: A description of the repository's purpose/contents.

name.description: A descriptive name for the repository.

slug.description: The slug identifies the repository in URIs.

slug_perm.description: The slug_perm immutably identifies the repository. It will never change once a repository has been created.

PolicyUploader.description: Serializer for packager uploader for policy puposes.

email.title: Email address
email.description: Your email address that we use to contact you. This is only visible to you.

active.description: If selected this is the active key for this repository.

default.description: If selected this is the default key for this repository.

fingerprint.description: The long identifier used by ECDSA for this key.

public_key.description: The public key given to repository users.

ssh_fingerprint.description: The SSH fingerprint used by ECDSA for this key.

active.description: If selected this is the active key for this repository.

default.description: If selected this is the default key for this repository.

fingerprint.description: The long identifier used by GPG for this key.

public_key.description: The public key given to repository users.

SecurityScanStatusEnum.description:
* `AWAITING_SCAN` - Awaiting Security Scan
* `SCANNING` - Security Scanning in Progress
* `VULNERABLE` - Scan Detected Vulnerabilities
* `NOT_VULNERABLE` - Scan Detected No Vulnerabilities
* `DISABLED` - Security Scanning Disabled
* `FAILED` - Security Scanning Failed
* `SKIPPED` - Security Scanning Skipped
* `UNSUPPORTED_PACKAGE` - Security Scanning Not Supported
* `UNSUPPORTED_FORMAT` - Security Scanning Not Supported

precedence.description: The order in which this action occurs relative to other actions for the same policy.

created_at.description: The date and time the policy was created.

updated_at.description: The date and time the policy was updated.
